channel.title: QEMU on THALIUM
channel.description: Recent content in QEMU on THALIUM

item.title: ECW 2023: The Calculator in Shadow (write-up)
item.description: The Calculator in Shadow was a hard pwn challenge created for the European Cyber Week CTF 2023 qualifiers. It included exploiting a RISC-V calculator running on top of a customized QEMU that featured a poorly implemented shadow stack.
